attributes.action: Petition for children on pack lunch who are entitled for free school meals
attributes.additional_details: Consider continuing free scjool meals vouchers to those children entitled but have to have pack lunches or chose to have packed lunch as they are still entitled and families do suffer
attributes.background: Government. Should give £15 vouchers for free scjool meals to children entitled to free scjool meals who have packed lunches all year round not just during covid some children have autism and can only eat certain things these families are entitled but yet still suffer because they aren’t receiving

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make Free School Meals (FSM) fairer and accessible to ALL low income families
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548960
